summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4816 for the improvement of the north and south alley in block 8, Plat of Columbia, being the alley between 37th Avenue South and Rainier Avenue, from Ferdinand Street to Edmunds Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55572, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
